In environment r : Z -> R H0 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3 x : R H : 0 <= x n : Z H1 : IZR n <= x H2 : x < IZR n + 1 Unable to unify "IZR n <= x" with "(fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => r 0%Z | 1%nat => r 1%Z | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + r 1%Z end) (Z.to_nat n) <= x".

In environment H4 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3 H0 : forall n m : Z, IZR (n + m) = IZR n + IZR m r : Z -> R x : R H : 0 <= x n : Z H1 : IZR n <= x H2 : x < IZR n + 1 H5, H7 : R Unable to unify "?M3169 < ?M3169 + 1" with "(fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => r 0%Z | 1%nat => r 1%Z | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + r 1%Z end) (Z.to_nat n) < x \\/ (fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => r 0%Z | 1%nat => r 1%Z | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + r 1%Z end) (Z.to_nat n) = x".

In environment x : R H : 0 <= x n : Z H1 : IZR n <= x < IZR n + 1 Unable to unify "?M3560 < ?M3560 \\/ ?M3560 = ?M3560" with "IZR (n + 1) < (fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => 0 | 1%nat => 1 | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + 1 end) (Z.to_nat n) + 1".

original: intros x H. specialize (floor_ex x) as [n H1]. exists (Z.to_nat n). unfold INR. split. - apply Rle_lt_trans with (IZR n). + apply H1. + rewrite <- plus_IZR. simpl. apply Rlt_n_Sn. - apply Rlt_trans with (IZR n + 1). + apply H1. + rewrite <- plus_IZR. simpl. apply Rle_refl.
